name: A11yMap Dev Dark - 14:59:31 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)

metadata.mapbox:title: Roads brightness
metadata.mapbox:description: Control how bright roads appear in dark styles

metadata.mapbox:title: Color theme
metadata.mapbox:description: Switch between predefined themes or set a custom theme.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color theme
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom theme based on a look-up table (LUT).

metadata.mapbox:title: Color
metadata.mapbox:description: Place label color used when setting highlight state.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color
metadata.mapbox:description: Place label color used when setting select state.

metadata.mapbox:title: Place labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows and hides place label layers.

metadata.mapbox:title: Motorway roads
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for motorway roads.

metadata.mapbox:title: Trunk roads
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for trunk roads.

metadata.mapbox:title: Other roads
metadata.mapbox:description: Set a custom color for other roads.

metadata.mapbox:title: Pedestrian roads, paths, trails
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows and hides all pedestrian roads, paths, trails.

metadata.mapbox:title: Road labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows and hides all road labels, including road shields.

metadata.mapbox:title: POI labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows or hides all POI icons and text.

metadata.mapbox:title: Transit labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows or hides all transit icons and text.

metadata.mapbox:title: 3d models
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows or hides all 3d layers (3D buildings, landmarks, trees, etc.) including shadows, ambient occlusion, and flood lights.

metadata.mapbox:title: Landmark Icons (beta)
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows or hides Landmark Icons.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color
metadata.mapbox:description: Building fill extrusion color used when setting select state.

metadata.mapbox:title: Color
metadata.mapbox:description: Building fill extrusion color used when setting highlight state.

metadata.mapbox:title: Light preset
metadata.mapbox:description: Switch between 4 time-of-day states: dusk, dawn, day and night.

metadata.mapbox:title: Font
metadata.mapbox:description: Defines font family for the style from predefined options.
Above polygons (land, landuse, water, etc.)
Above lines (roads, etc.) and behind 3D buildings
Above POI labels and behind Place and Transit labels

metadata.mapbox:title: Points of interest
metadata.mapbox:description: A point of interest.

mapbox:states.doc: When `true`, hides the icon and text. Use this state when displaying a custom annotation on top.

mapbox:properties.name: name
mapbox:properties.doc: Name of the point of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: group
mapbox:properties.doc: A high-level category, like POI, airport, transit, etc.

mapbox:properties.name: class
mapbox:properties.doc: A broad category of point of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: maki
mapbox:properties.doc: An icon identifier, designed to assign icons using the Maki icon project or other icons that follow the same naming scheme.

mapbox:properties.name: transit_mode
mapbox:properties.doc: Mode of transport served by a stop/station. Expected to be null for non-transit points of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: transit_stop_type
mapbox:properties.doc: A type of transit stop. Expected to be null for non-transit points of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: transit_network
mapbox:properties.doc: A rail station network identifier that is part of specific local or regional transit systems. Expected to be null for non-transit points of interest.

mapbox:properties.name: airport_ref
mapbox:properties.doc: A short identifier code of the airport. Expected to be null for non-airport points of interest

metadata.mapbox:title: Place labels
metadata.mapbox:description: Points for labeling places including countries, states, cities, towns, and neighborhoods.

mapbox:states.doc: When `true`, hides the label. Use this state when displaying a custom annotation on top.
When `true`, the feature is highlighted. Use this state to create a temporary effect (e.g. hover).
When `true`, the feature is selected. Use this state to create a permanent effect. Note: the `select` state has a higher priority than `highlight`.

mapbox:properties.name: class
mapbox:properties.doc: Provides a broad distinction between place types.

metadata.mapbox:title: Buildings
metadata.mapbox:description: Featureset describing the buildings.

mapbox:states.doc: When `true`, the building is highlighted. Use this state to create a temporary effect (e.g. hover).
When `true`, the building is selected. Use this state to create a permanent effect. Note: the `select` state has a higher priority than `highlight`.

mapbox:properties.name: group
mapbox:properties.doc: A high-level building group like building-2d, building-3d, etc.

metadata.mapbox:title: Landmark Icons
metadata.mapbox:description: Icons for landmark buildings

mapbox:properties.name: name
mapbox:properties.doc: Name of the Landmark in local language.

mapbox:properties.name: name_en
mapbox:properties.doc: Name of the Landmark in English.

mapbox:properties.name: short_name
mapbox:properties.doc: Short name of the Landmark in local language.

mapbox:properties.name: short_name_en
mapbox:properties.doc: Short name of the Landmark in English.
